Text:
I'm sorry, but I don't understand the point of this torrent:  why upscale the first episode of "The Dalek Invasion of Earth" (that's the 4th episode from season 2, anyway) from a low-quality encode in another torrent... and why is it so MASSIVE?

I was hoping this was actually a torrent for "The Name of the Doctor"... but 0 seeders and 7 leechers doesn't make me want to waste my time.  I'll be able to get a WEB-DL of the episode by the time I'd have a chance of downloading this one!

Sorry for sounding so mean in the last comment, but I realize now that this must be all of 'The Romans' serial from season 2.

I still must confess that I don't see the benefit of "upscaling" a DVD (or VHS) rip... can anyone enlighten me?
